author: Football Italia staff
title: Petition to give Atalanta the Scudetto
description: Someone has started a petition asking for the 2019-20 Serie A title to be handed to Atalanta, as the city of Bergamo has been hardest hit by the coronavirus pandemic.  	There are now 15,362 deaths registered in Italy from the virus, with 8,656 of them being i…
content:
Someone has started a petition asking for the 2019-20 Serie A title to be handed to Atalanta, as the city of Bergamo has been hardest hit by the coronavirus pandemic.
There are now 15,362 deaths registered in Italy from the virus, with 8,656 of them being in… [+1331 chars]
